apply.denStar: Apply to become a DEN STAR
apply.nowDenStar: Apply now to become a DEN STAR
apply.starDescription: As a Discovery Education partner, you are already a member of this amazing community known as the DEN. However, you may want to become more active and become a DEN STAR. STAR Discovery Educators are the most active members of the DEN Community and receive special benefits from Discovery Education.
apply.starEvents: Apply to become a STAR events

newDen.communityDescription:
is a global community of teachers passionate about teaching with digital media, sharing resources, collaborating and networking.

Find out how a DEN membership can help you lead the way in transforming your classroom and inspiring your students' curiosity.
